Also consider cases where uncountable nouns like 'rice', 'information', 'advice' are used, which can sometimes be treated as singular or plural. Respond with the total quantity of specified categories such as general objects, types of fruits, animals, etc. For the purpose of this task, define an 'object' as any countable item mentioned in the context
